snippet: J. J. Hickson, a center and forward for the Denver Nuggets, was suspended for five games without pay by the N.B.A. for violating the terms of its antidrug program.
abstract: Denver Nuggets forward J J Hickson is suspended for five games without pay for violating the NBA's antidrug program; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: J. J. Hickson, a center and forward for the Denver Nuggets, was suspended for five games without pay by the N.B.A. for violating the terms of its antidrug program.
